required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Compartmental Inflammation in Mechanically Ventilated Patients With COVID-19
clinical_study.official_title: Early and Late Pulmonary and Systemic Inflammation in Critically Ill, Mechanically Ventilated Patients With Verified COVID-19

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the present study is to examine the inflammatory response in the pulmonary compartment and blood of critically ill patients admitted to the ICU with COVID-19.

detailed_description.textblock: The mechanisms of the ARDS-like respiratory failure observed in patients with COVID-19 are currently unknown, but may be related to a distinct local immune response within the lung. In the present study, we will examine the cellular and humoral pulmonary immune response in mechanically ventilated patients admitted to the ICU with COVID-19 by examining immune cell profiles, cytokine patterns, and the complement pathway in bronchoalveolar lavage fluid, and relate it to the concomitant systemic inflammatory response. We will examine the patients on day 1-3 and 7-9 after ICU admission.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 (subsequent to study inclusion in the ICU)
primary_outcome.description: Total white blood cells, neutrocytes, lymphocytes, and monocytes in bronchoalveolar lavage fluid and blood
Total white blood cells, neutrocytes, lymphocytes, and monocytes in bronchoalveolar lavage fluid and blood

primary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 (subsequent to study inclusion in the ICU)
primary_outcome.description: Cell populations and subpopulations evaluated by 10 colored flow cytometry (B cells, T cells, TCR subsets, Tregs/Th17, dendritic cells, myeloid cells and neutrophils) in bronchoalveolar lavage fluid and blood

Cell populations and subpopulations evaluated by 10 colored flow cytometry (B cells, T cells, TCR subsets, Tregs/Th17, dendritic cells, myeloid cells and neutrophils) in bronchoalveolar lavage fluid and blood

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 (subsequent to study inclusion in the ICU)
secondary_outcome.description: Multiplex assay for measuring cytokines in bronchoalveolar lavage fluid and plasma (e.g. IL-1-beta, IL-1RA, IL-2, IL-6, IL-8, IL-10, IL-17, IL-18, IL-33, IL-35, TGF-beta, TNF-alpha, HMGB1)
Multiplex assay for measuring cytokines in bronchoalveolar lavage fluid and plasma (e.g. IL-1-beta, IL-1RA, IL-2, IL-6, IL-8, IL-10, IL-17, IL-18, IL-33, IL-35, TGF-beta, TNF-alpha, HMGB1)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 (subsequent to study inclusion in the ICU)
secondary_outcome.description: MBL, ficolin-1, ficolin-2, ficolin-3, and MASPs in bronchoalveolar lavage fluid and plasma
MBL, ficolin-1, ficolin-2, ficolin-3, and MASPs in bronchoalveolar lavage fluid and plasma
Growth of pathogenic microorganisms in body fluids (e.g. urine, blood, bronchoalveolar lavage fluid)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 (subsequent to study inclusion in the ICU)
secondary_outcome.description: Respiratory filmarray PCR for testing for pathogens
Respiratory filmarray PCR for testing for pathogens

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 (subsequent to study inclusion in the ICU)
secondary_outcome.description: 16S ribosomal RNA (rRNA) and 18S rRNA PCR for bacterial or fungal pathogen identification in bronchoalveolar lavage fluid
16S ribosomal RNA (rRNA) and 18S rRNA PCR for bacterial or fungal pathogen identification in bronchoalveolar lavage fluid

secondary_outcome.measure: Levels of SARS-CoV-2 in the airways

secondary_outcome.description: Semiquant PCR of SARS-CoV-2 in bronchoalveolar lavage fluid

Daily assessment in the ICU up to 12 weeks

biospec_descr.textblock: Bronchoalveolar lavage fluid Plasma Whole blood

study_pop.textblock: Mechanically ventilated COVID-19 patients with ARDS included within 3 days of ICU admission

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age > 18y
- Mechanical ventilation
- Verified COVID-19 (throat swab or tracheal aspirate positive for SARS-CoV-2)
- ARDS according to the Berlin definition
Exclusion Criteria:
- Untreated malignant tachycardia or bradycardia
- Suspected or verified intracranial hypertension (ICP > 15 mmHg)
- Unilateral lung ventilation
- Severe non-correctable coagulopathy

overall_official.affiliation: Dept. of Intensive Care, University Hospital Hvidovre, Denmark
